name: Crystal Clear (Maisic, DiegoGH14)
description:
You are a miner who awakens in a mysterious crystal cave. Beside you there is a scroll of prophecy, one which tells you of the quest you are to embark on. On your way, you will find your path riddled with disconnected platforms which can be filled with just a simple switch in your point of view (press the left or right keys to switch). You’ll jump and soar to new heights, traveling across several worlds collecting the many Stones of the Self along the way. As you progress through the game, the levels will increase in difficulty, and your timing and memory will come in handy on your mystical quest of self-discovery!

- 4 Unique Biomes to Travel Across
- 10 Exciting Levels to Cross
- Collect the Stones of the Self at the end of every level

1st place ranking of Aztec Game Lab's Summer Game Jam 2
